# Facetas
Las facetas tienen por objeto segmentar gr치ficos, en funci칩n de una variable categ칩rica.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
library(gcookbook)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

## Crear el gr치fico base
```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}
CO2_plot <- ggplot(CO2, aes(x = conc, y = uptake)) +
  geom_point()

```


## Crear facetas horizontales
```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}
CO2_plot +
  facet_grid(. ~ Type)

```

## Crear facetas verticales
```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}
CO2_plot +
 facet_grid(Treatment ~ .)

```

## Crear facetas con doble entrada
```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}
CO2_plot +
 facet_grid(Treatment ~ Type)
```
